flawed_nl_solution:
In round one, Jeff completed 16 - 1 = <<16-1=51>>51.
In round two, Jeff completed 16 - 3 = <<16-3=13>>13.
In round three, Jeff completed 16 + 4 = <<16+4=20>>20.
In round four, Jeff completed 16 / 2 = <<16/2=8>>8.
Jeff completed 51 + 13 + 20 + 8 = <<51+13+20+8=92>>92 skips in total.
Jeff skipped an average of 92 / 4 = <<92/4=23>>23 skips per round.
#### 23

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 51. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
